alert.note: Alert for Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:17PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wallace, southwestern Thomas, northwestern Logan and southeastern Sherman Counties through 845 PM MDT/945 PM CDT/... At 817 PM MDT/917 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Brewster, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winona. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 24 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT/1100 PM CDT/ for northwestern and west central Kansas.
